alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lincoln (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:48AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Columbia, Lincoln, northwestern Edgefield, southwestern Saluda and McCormick Counties through 830 AM EST... At 747 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ninety Six Historic Site to near Lincolnton. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edgefield, Saluda, McCormick, Johnston, Lincolnton, Troy, Clarks Hill Recreation Area, Elijah Clark State Park, Mistletoe State Park, Hamilton Branch State Park, Saluda County Airport, J. Strom Thurmond Dam, Mccormick County Airport, Parksville, Plum Branch, Bordeaux, Saluda Co Sheriff`s Office, Scott`s Landing, Northside Fire Station Main and Knox Scout Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
